pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 10, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Scarborough Health Network’s Centenary Hospital, where he will meet with children and parents at a vaccination clinic. Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada Gary Anandasangaree, Member of Parliament for Scarborough Centre Salma Zahid, Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Guildwood John McKay, and Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Agincourt Jean Yip will be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will meet with the Women’s Economic Council of Canada, a Canadian organization advocating for women-centred community economic development.

Closed to media
